body_html:
Just curious. Under what circumstance do you not want to initialize the local variables?

I'm not sure, but maybe when the training was initiated, but interrupted for some reason; and now you want to restart from the point you left instead of going back to epoch 1..?

I'm not sure, but maybe when the training was initiated, but interrupted for some reason; and now you want to restart from the point you left instead of going back to epoch 1..?
